def_cn: (欧洲生活在3.5万年至7万年之前的)尼安德特人的
def_en: Neanderthal people lived in Europe between 35,000 and 70,000 years ago.

def_cn: (尤指男性)极端守旧的，粗鲁的，未开化的
def_en: If you describe people's, especially men's, ideas or ways of behaving as Neanderthal, you disapprove of them because they are very old-fashioned and uncivilized.

def_cn: (指男性)原始人，野蛮人，凶猛粗鲁的人
def_en: If you call a man a neanderthal, you disapprove of him because you think he behaves in a very uncivilized way.
